title: COVID-19 vaccination: at-risk children aged 6 months to 11 years
description: Information for parents of eligible at-risk children aged 6 months to 11 years on COVID-19 vaccination.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 vaccination: at-risk children aged 6 months to 11 years Information for parents of eligible at-risk children aged 6 months to 11 years on COVID-19 vaccination. Applies to England Documents Details This leaflet should be given to parents and carers of eligible at-risk children aged 6 months to 11 years prior to the vaccination appointment. Paper copies of this leaflet are available free to [pre-order](https://www.healthpublications.gov.uk/ViewArticle.html?sp=Scovid19aguideforatriskchildrenaged0to11years) from Health Publications. [Resources for all children aged 5 to 11 years](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-resources-for-children-aged-5-to-11-years) are available to download and order. [Resources for all children and young people aged 12 to 17 years](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-resources-for-children-and-young-people) are available to download and order. Health publications orderline Immunisation Publications UK Health Security Agency 61 Colindale NW9 5EQ Contact form [https://healthpublicat...](https://healthpublications.gov.uk) Telephone: 0300 123 1002 Copies of printed publications and the full range of digital resources to support the immunisation programmes can now be ordered and downloaded online. Log in to register and place your order. Last updated 29 June 2023 [+ show all updates](#full-history) - Added order link. - First published.
